txt.en: 'It depends who you ask, I suppose... but since you are asking me, Stanric is the real commander at Stangard. Always has been.\n\nStanric is a good man, and he does his duty with pride and honour. It was always hard for him to make ends meet in Stangard, so many men resent him, but things have only gotten worse with Sithric's arrival... but please do not repeat any of this.'
Who is the real leader here?
